description:
In this brief tutorial, we will learn how to check if your Linux system supports AVX and AVX2 instructions from the command line.

The post How to Check if Your Linux System Supports AVX & AVX2 appeared first on Linux Today.
title: How to Check if Your Linux System Supports AVX & AVX2

description:
Ubuntu 24.10 (Oracular Oriole) aims to enhance the operating system, focusing on polish, provisioning, and app improvements. Here’s more on that!

title: Insight into Ubuntu 24.10 (Oracular Oriole) Plans

description:
NVIDIA 555 beta graphics driver for Linux is now available for public testing with explicit sync support on Wayland and other improvements. Here’s what to expect from the final release.

The post NVIDIA 555 Beta Linux Graphics Driver Released with Explicit Sync Support appeared first on Linux Today.
title: NVIDIA 555 Beta Linux Graphics Driver Released with Explicit Sync Support

description:
This guide will walk you through the knowledge and steps needed to migrate your CentOS 7 servers to Ubuntu 24.04 with minimal downtime and data loss.

The post The Complete Checklist for Migrating from CentOS to Ubuntu appeared first on Linux Today.
title: The Complete Checklist for Migrating from CentOS to Ubuntu

description:
You’re a good guy, mon frere. That means brother in French. I don’t know how I know that. I took four years of Spanish. Look at us, crying like a couple of girls on the last day of camp. Everything they do is so dramatic and flamboyant. It just makes me want to set myself […]

The post Bluth Ipsum – TEST STORY SUBMISSION – DO NOT PUBLISH!!! appeared first on Linux Today.
title: Bluth Ipsum – TEST STORY SUBMISSION – DO NOT PUBLISH!!!
